msgVehicleData.cylindercapacity: Must be a number between 1 and 2000
msgVehicleData.engineperformance: Must be a number between 1 and 2000
msgVehicleData.payload: Must be a number between 1 and 1000
msgVehicleData.totalweight: Must be a number between 100 and 50000
msgVehicleData.listprice: Must be a number between 500 and 100000
msgVehicleData.annualmileage: Must be a number between 100 and 100000

msgInsurantData.firstname: Must be at least 2 characters long and must only contain letters
msgInsurantData.lastname: Must be at least 2 characters long and must only contain letters
msgInsurantData.zipcode: Must be a number between 4 and 8 digits
